metadata.Title: CVE-2020-16150 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: A Lucky 13 timing side channel in mbedtls_ssl_decrypt_buf in library/ssl_msg.c in Trusted Firmware Mbed TLS through 2.23.0 allows an attacker to recover secret key information. This affects CBC mode because of a computed time difference based on a padding length.

criterions.comment: mbedtls package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
